website_summaries.verdict: With leather grip and compact size, it's a nice, affordable alternative to classic models. Unique and portable.
pros: Leather handle is easy to grip
cons: The small size isn't practical for everyone - or for putting on all types of footwear

customer_reviews.title: As you grow older
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my old man, who now has a habit of using shoe horns to help him put on his footwear and something that I might follow in with soon; so I probably should've ordered two. Next order then, otherwise it's a perfectly convenient and reliable product that won't break like the plastic shoe horns might (which someone handed out to my father, but he wasn't sure about it and it was too small); so I took a chance with this product and it panned out nicely in the end. Very generous in size that had me questioning whether it would fit in my father's pocket, and very tough...
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. Fits right in behind the heel. The leather strap provides the right amount of grip. Used it with leather dress shoes and with big work boots, worked great with both, feet just slid into the shoe. Should have got this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Essad

customer_reviews.title: Does It's Job Admirably
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's a shoe horn. What can you say about a shoe horn? Works great, but if you're thinking about a long or short one, I'd go for the longer. Yes, I know this is a "travel" shoe horn, so I'm giving it five stars, but I kind of wish I had gotten a longer one. Not sure if this company makes a longer one, but if they do, I'd recommend that. I have long legs so it's a bit of a stretch when I'm still trying to wake up going off to work in the morning, ha But yes, if you've come here thinking you could use a shoe horn, yes, do it. This is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids...buy 2!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little sturdy shoe horn just like what dad had when I was growing up! Works great. The metal is sturdy and lets your foot slide in easily. Gave one to my granddaughter who struggled to get on her sneakers...showed her how easy it was to use...she loves it...had to buy another because she keeps ‘borrowing’ it. She’s probably the only kid in her class that even knows what a shoe horn is...something so old school and low tech...there is something to be said about the simple things in life. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if not traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great quality materials. Some shoe horns I have used are too short, but not this one--just the right length and the leather grip on the handle makes it easy to hold when putting on my elderly fathers shoes. While I don't use the travel bag, if it could be a little better quality, which is on par with high grade packing not suitable for a personal item. I would have felt better about the product if it had been left out altogether; for the great price I would not have felt cheated, but if I needed the bag I would have.
customer_reviews.author: James E Turbeville

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gentleman's Accessory
customer_reviews.text: I bought some nice shoes in the summer (thin socks), and later found them difficult to put on (thick socks). So I went looking for a shoe-horn. This one looks so fancy, and for under $10 (Prime) I couldn't resist. The chrome plating looks great, and the leather part adds a classy look, even though it will never leave my room. *I just realized that my title is very similar to the product tag line - but I'm going to leave it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well-made
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I loved the first one, I decided to buy another one to keep in the office since I have to switch to steel toes from time to time. It's super easy and durable. Sometimes I keep it in the bag so that it stays concealed but mostly I just keep it in my desk freely. The product is well-made and ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: oel

customer_reviews.title: Works as Intended
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the durability and quality of this shoe horn. I needed something stronger than the plastic ones to help get some braces into my shoes as I go through physical therapy. The size helps me get my shoes on without assistance and it is a good size/durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great show horn
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an everyday shoe horn. Being stainless steel it easily glides your foot into the shoe. It is also stylish with the faux leather handle. The only thing is that the shoe horn is difficult to store. If you want to hang it up, you need to thread in a string or rope through the loop.
customer_reviews.author: Denise W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Planning on buying a few more! This came promptly, and was nicely packaged in its own drawstring bag - it's very nicely made, and works well! I will be buying a few more to stash in my car and office. Would make a lovely gift as well. Can't beat it for the price. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Bake Woman

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This little shoe horn is a perfect fit for me. It's about the length of my palm. It works well and slides my loafers on real easily. I have a plastic shoe horn as well, but my preference is always the steel horn. I like the faux leather tip too. It gives the shoe horn a nice look. I would recommend this product. It's also a great travel size.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2' long shoe horn but I needed a small shoe horn for travel. This one is perfect for the job. It is steel so it's not going to break like a plastic horn. The leather handle is a nice feature to aid in gripping. I use this mostly for dress shoes but it also works well with tennis shoes when you don't want to re-tie them everytime. The horn comes with a fabric case with a drawstring. It's nice to keep the horn in but the drawstring is useless. Overall, this is exactly what I expected it to be and it does what it is designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: TitleGuy

customer_reviews.title: "Strap" is an exaggeration, but it's a good shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoehorn. It's steel, it's well-made, and it has a nice leather handle. A "strap" it ain't; there's a little leather loop on the handle, and you could run a cord through it if you want a cord. I don't, and I don't particularly care whether it has a strap. If you care about having a strap on your shoehorn, just be aware that the leather loop is less than 1" long and you'll need something more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance Bug

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived smelling terrible
customer_reviews.text: The leather end of the shoe horn was moldy and smelled terrible. There was no way to take away this smell. I finally cut the leather end off and through it away.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Badian

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: It was excellent from order to delivery to use. This is my first and it’s much better than what I’ve seen in the men’s or shoe departments. I’m liking the effect on the heels of my shoes especially. I’ve got a couple pairs that are particularly difficult to get on without crushing the heel area. Once on they fit fine, but the repeated crushing of the leather heel was concerning me. Now I slide right in. And it oooks pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Navydiver701

customer_reviews.title: as nice as it appears
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this shoe horn. A bit strange to go on about a shoe horn but I really wanted something other than just the metal kind that are uncomfortable to hold. This on the other hand is great. Very well made and comfortable handle. I give this product a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: FL Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated buying this shoe horn due to some of the critical reviews about the glue and stitching of the leather, but I liked the shape of it because of the amount of curve in the metal. I didn't want a shoe horn that was overly flat. I'm very happy with it -- the workmanship is fine and the shape fits the back of my foot well.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I appreciate the quality and the amount of use I get out of it for the low price.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for it's use. I like the leather tip for holding. It's usually a little a highlight of my day each morning to get to slip into my nice shoes already tied with ease using this gadget. I appreciate the quality and the amount of use I get out of it for the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect to keep in my purse
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to keep in my purse! I have mobility issues which makes it difficult to put shoes on and this is a tremendous help. A metal shoehorn works much more smoothly than a plastic one and this one is perfect! This shoehorn is very well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Makes slipping into shoes easy. Nice and sturdy too.
customer_reviews.text: The stainless steel shoe horn allows me to slip into my shoes with great ease. It is very sturdy and curves well around my heel. It comes in a handy travel bag and is small enough to be easily carried along for trips. The leather handle gives it a touch of elegance. I would surely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I bought expensive shoes for work as I'm on my feet a lot, but was having trouble getting them on and desperately needed a shoe horn. Such a simple device but makes a big difference! Love the leather handle.
customer_reviews.author: Moosie

customer_reviews.title: No more smashed heels.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a person who normally just slips my shoes on. I’m tired of wearing down the top part of the heel on my shoe. This is so easy to just slip in my shoe and slip the shoes on. It seems to be quality and should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Carma Davis

customer_reviews.title: but really inexpensive and works great. I haven't had to tie a pair of ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost one of these and bought another exact same one. It's just a shoehorn, but really inexpensive and works great. I haven't had to tie a pair of shoes in a long time now. It feels like quality materials, chromed metal with a "leather" handle. Maybe it is real leather, who knows?
customer_reviews.author: Acumen VanDerSlice

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm to put on my size 18 running shoes. I don't even have to relace them, the shoes just slip right on with the shoe horn. The leather handle is also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L. Giffen

customer_reviews.title: simply the finest personal implement I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Made of Valerian Steel and forged by the Gods...simply the finest personal implement I have ever owned. This prized possession is destined to become a family heirloom. Men weep after using this....the steely glide into the shoe....the soft, "cupping" of your heel...the feel of warm leather in your hand as your foot slides effortlessly into the shoe...I cannot endorse this product highly enough. 10 stars wouldn't do it justice. If you don't have one, your life is not complete. Drop everything and buy one immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ed "Captain" Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect utility for any man
customer_reviews.text: Saw it as a lightning deal and decided why not. A friend of mine always used one and I always viewed them as such an old man thing to have and now I am eating my words as my feet slip into my nice dress shoes for work every morning no problem. Once you use one you won't go back!
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected. Was inside of cheapy carry bag. A leather case would have been preferred but that would also mean a more expensive product. I recommend adding a small leather loop. It would really up the quality and versatility
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Crap packaging, but good product.
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the actual shoehorn and leather sleeve are fantastic. The packaging is a little suspect, as they mirrored the name of the product incorrectly on the carrying pouch. To answer a few questions, the product is made in China and has a leather sleeve riveted on to the handle; the sleeve is not removable as the rivet goes through both the leather and the shoehorn.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Costello

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoehorn???
customer_reviews.text: Never thought a shoehorn could be a beautiful thing but this one is. Comes in a black velvety case and the horn has a leathery handle. Amazing for the money. I travel a lot so it’s size for packing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang

customer_reviews.title: Makes my morning routine a little easier.
customer_reviews.text: Use it very morning. Works on my dress shoes, sneakers and work shoes. Honestly makes my morning a little nicer to not have to jam my thumb in the back of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rico G

customer_reviews.title: Great grip!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe horn and the leather strap keeps it from slipping out of my fingers. It can even be hung in a convenient location for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: ALP

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Useful
customer_reviews.text: Every man needs a shoe horn.... It makes putting your shoes on effortless in the morning and also preserves your shoes and feet from damage. I use this stainless shoehorn when I travel. I have a longer one for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Gustave

customer_reviews.title: Well made shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy with a nice leather handle. Good for travel and comes with a soft case. Only fault, the handle could have been designed better for hanging. I’m going to save a lot of wear and tear on my slip ones. A perfect size for sitting in a chair. Not for standing or on a high mattress. I have a long one for that.
customer_reviews.author: zachary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it's supposed to and the leather handle makes it easier to hold with arthritic hands. Thanks for a terrific and useful product!
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shoe horn and very useful
customer_reviews.text: This shoe horn is better than any other I've owned. The leather grip strap is large enough to grab, but not too large as to hinder slipping your foot into the shoe. My heel slides nicely down the stainless steel slide every time. The quality is superior and it works very well. Much better than the plastic ones I've had in the past that crack.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoehorn.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoehorn. Leather part looks like quality. Only reason I docked it a star is because the metal horn part had some unfortunate machining marks and scrapes. This doesn’t affect use at all, just makes it look less perfect than it could.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect made it unusable.
customer_reviews.text: It had a sharp manufacturing defect. Right where the heel would slide there was a sharp small dent. I should have listened to the other reviewers saying the same thing. I sent it back and bought something else. Not worth all the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best shoe horn one can get
customer_reviews.text: Product is Light but sturdy; The blade is thin so it easily fits between sock and shoe but strong; Shoe Horn is easy to use and durable. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: salespeople today do NOT know what a shoehorn is (especially the young people) I remember fondly when this item was a free gift with a shoe purchase. I like this item and carry it in my purse! NOT FOR GENTLEMEN ONLY
customer_reviews.author: just talkin

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is, and it is great.
customer_reviews.text: It's a piece of sturdy, shaped metal with a leather end. It doesn't feel cheap. It works just like you'd expect a shoe horn to work. My kids love it. I don't use it cause I'm not lazy like they are.
customer_reviews.author: C. Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t needed or used a shoe horn in several years, but my newest boots were difficult to get on but fit great. This shoe horn was the answer to my delimma! I keep it in my boot so as not to misplace it😊
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The glue to hold the "leather" was very sloppy and dripped down the metal. The bag to hold is is made of that material that is almost like a paper and looks very cheap, it would have been better to leave it out all together. The size is good (some shoe horns are super small) but the leather offers nothing in functionality or to make you feel it's a premium product.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband a long handled shoe horn, but my son took it apart to have a shorter one. So I bought this, and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angels4angels

customer_reviews.title: The shoe horn works like it's the best shoe horn in the world
customer_reviews.text: Works like a shoe horn is supposed to! The leather grip on the handhold works well to help pull the shoe horn out of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and quality made. The leather strap makes this shoe horn, "rich" looking and is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JWebbe

customer_reviews.title: Most useful tool
customer_reviews.text: Others have already said enough about this shoe horn. It is attractive and great size for travel. It is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: PearlGirlTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband. He likes it and it is easy to use while sitting down to put his shoes on. The metal shoe horn is much more sturdy than the plastic ones. It is really difficult to find the stainless steel shoe horn.
customer_reviews.author: Editor of Lillian's Diaries

customer_reviews.title: Best for the traveling type.
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted. Could it be a little longer? Sure, but then I can't just throw it in a bag and take it wherever.
customer_reviews.author: Rita L.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: This shoe horn is great, just what I was looking for, except it is a little shorter than the ideal shoe horn. Nonetheless, it's terrific and I like it a lot, enough that I took it with me on a recent trip to the East Coast.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W. Lim

customer_reviews.title: Yup
customer_reviews.text: Not bad quality. I didn’t have much expectation and it met that with flying colors. Hasn’t fallen apart yet after 2mo
customer_reviews.author: Steven Brewer

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty self explanatory
customer_reviews.text: Okay so first off I’ll start by saying that I bought this because I’m lazy to put on my shoes and I use it to be easier to slip in, that being said this thing is really well made. I mean for what it is just the look itself including the leather handle is well crafted. For the price I figure you can find something cheaper that will do the trick but I took a gamble just on looks alone and it’s a gem.
customer_reviews.author: Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and the leather protects my hands when I have to exert some force. No way I can see to improve it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Shoehorn me Fam
customer_reviews.text: It's so good I carry it around as a necklace and whenever I see people trying to get a shoe on I offer to help like I'm lighting their cigarette. My co-workers think I'm autistic now but what do they know about good shoe appliances?
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Crunch

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a travel shoe horn because it was cheap and looked nice. It works really well, better than the long one I keep in my closet at home. Will be buying a bunch of these to stick in each piece of luggage. One funny thing, "gainwell" is printed as its mirror image on the little cloth bag that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pierson

customer_reviews.title: exactly as expected. perfect
customer_reviews.text: not rocket science, but it does save shoes. totally what I needed when I had to replace a broken plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: Boston suburban dweller

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Only wished the handle was a bit longer. But that is because I'm old and am endowed with some decrepitude.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shoe Horn
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shoe horn. Great size for my size 13 shoes and the leather handle makes it seem a little nicer than most. The metal is heavy duty and doesn't look like it is going to bend any time soon. The leather handle is very nice and appears to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent E. Grazano

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and smooth, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little shoehorn for my household. Sturdy and smooth, easy to operate. The leather handle, smaller size, and travel pouch are all icing on the cake! I recommend this to anyone who hates unloosening and unloosening and unloosening dress shoes just so they can tighten them way back up again or to anyone who doesn't want to untie their sneakers every time they need to go out.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Jackelen

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: If there is such a thing as a nice shoe horn this is it. Price is right for the quality. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NCP

customer_reviews.title: Cool leather strap adds to value
customer_reviews.text: Perect for home and travel. Cool leather strap adds to value. Buy with confidence! I just reordered one for my friend and I made a note - wonderful Christmas stocking stuffer..... if you can excuse the pun..lol!
customer_reviews.author: KEITH

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my young grandon, fits his hands well, now he can get his foot into his shoes easily. Sturdy and lightweight. The leather on the handle is a great idea, cushions your hands from getting sore or more. All around just right.
customer_reviews.author: NJGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great compact tool
customer_reviews.text: I use it to get into ankle high hiking boots, it does great. Sturdy metal and i think the leather adds a touch of class. Great compact size and Light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: I can more easily don my shoes!
customer_reviews.text: What's to like or dislike about a shoe horn?!! Lol!! I like that it helps me get my shoes on and it fits in my drawer nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Likky

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made with defect
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. The edge was not smooth and hurt my foot. Has some scratch when open as well
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap shoe horn made for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoe horn. It’s small, so you can take it with you on trips and it would take up room. It also looks nice. Leather handle makes it easy to hold and stainless steel piece that makes it simple to put on your dress shoes. Also these shoe horn was super cheap👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Damion

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a very nice accessory and well built, I expect it to last me forever although it was quite a bit smaller than I expected, not a disadvantage though.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden Teegarden

customer_reviews.title: Best first shoe horn!
customer_reviews.text: First ever shoe horn, and still going strong! Not only do I use it with dress shoes but regular sneakers, and I can't go back to not using one.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece
customer_reviews.text: I am over 50, and this is the first shoe horn I've owned. Used it once and was extremely pleased! Also like the pouch that comes with it!
customer_reviews.author: Drummer's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Small, aesthetically appealing, and performs its function admirably!
customer_reviews.text: As I've started to have to travel a lot for work, this has been a great item to take along with me. It's not hard for a shoehorn to function properly, but this one is small, looks nice, and is reasonably durable.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: The shoehorn works as expected. The grip is not ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoehorn works as expected. The grip is not genuine leather. Shame on Gainwell for the inaccurate narrative and Amazon for continuing to allow it.
customer_reviews.author: pjc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe Horn
customer_reviews.text: Nice and solid shoe horn. No bending !! I think this one will last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Art Schrock

customer_reviews.title: Just a little short for slip on's
customer_reviews.text: A little short, but works OK It has to overcome the strong elastic on my laseless shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Lee

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing, works great, so cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great product at any price, but it was very inexpensive. I travel with this one but its long enough to be your everyday if you don't need a 2 foot shoe horn.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Holthouse

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy and bigger than my last metal shoe horn. The metal is too strong to warp under any normal circumstances. The design looks good and it is quite functional.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: The Gainwell shoe horn is awesome. There is a basic shape and function that ...
customer_reviews.text: The Gainwell shoe horn is awesome. There is a basic shape and function that all shoe horns share. But not all shoehorns are created equal. What makes this one stand out and above are a variety of touches. The shoe horn is made of stainless steel that has substantive heft. The leather strap provides a classy esthetic. The horn comes with its own bag to make it an easy traveling companion. Your foot will slip easily into your shoe and you'll do it with class.
customer_reviews.author: M. Andrew Martz

customer_reviews.title: First time using a shoe horn... It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer. It makes putting on my dress shoes so much easier. I don't know how I survived for so long without on. This particular shoe horn is short, which means it is easy to store and to travel with, but does require you to bend over when using it. If bending over would be a problem for you, maybe get a bigger one. If space is an issue, this thing is perfect since it doesn't take up much at all. It is high quality and feels good in the hand. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good size for home use and the travel. I tried wearing the hard ankle boots using this and works great. Nice touch on the leather.
customer_reviews.author: anita park

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product, aesthetically pleasing. Only reason I gave a 4/5 stars is because the glue they used has leaked out a bit onto the visible part of the metal. Not a big deal, and hardly noticeable, but I take notice to that kind of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: The shoe horn is perfect. Have some arthritis in my fingers and it was difficult to get shoes on since high tops. Shoe horn was what I needed. I like that the handle is small and comes in a nice sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this shoe horn, feels expensive and classic looking, something I hope to own for a long time. Comes in a nice carrying case if you are someone that likes to protect things
customer_reviews.author: YoToYo

customer_reviews.title: Great value and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: No need to untie laces with this shoe horn. Saves time with getting out the door! This is a well made shoe horn.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Miles

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly useful
customer_reviews.text: My wife makes fun of me for using this, calling me an old man...but it's worth it because this works great for squeezing into tight shoes
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T

customer_reviews.title: Life changer!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what was missing from my life until I received this shoe horn! Make putting on those "difficult" shoes a real breeze! Sometimes I put shoes on and take them off just to feel that slick polished metal on the back of my foot and the satisfying grab of the shoe around my heel with no effort. The leather handle makes this a classy item. This is something that will become a family heirloom. I can just see the kids fighting over it now! Seriously, there is no reason to struggle with tight shows when these things exist on the planet.
customer_reviews.author: John Covele

customer_reviews.title: It's a shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, but does the job. Feet into shoes without hurting the heel.
customer_reviews.author: ThingReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe horn is comfortable to use and makes the shoes I just bought, which were slightly difficult put in, a snap to put on. I’m quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Appealing to the eye - sturdy- cane in a pouch - will be great for travel home use -
customer_reviews.author: Maria Warner

customer_reviews.title: Get your footwear on in a snap
customer_reviews.text: Great built shoe horn. The steel is not flimsy at all and the leather strap feels good in the hand. Will order a second one to keep in the car for those events that require taking your shoes off.
customer_reviews.author: A.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my trip to Japan, and it was very convenient. Went on my keychain, very slick and comfortable feel.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for those who wear formal shoes. It prevents your shoe wear and tear due to pushing in by your foot. This slides your foot in. It is so handy that my 6 years daughter use it :-) The leather grip at the end is nice. Talking about the size, it is perfect to carry along with you while travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeh

customer_reviews.title: Horn for shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Putting on shoes has never been more exciting! Such luxury!
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: It's a shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: It's a shoe horn, it works like a shoe horn. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bluejello

customer_reviews.title: Gentlewoman's shoehorn, too!
customer_reviews.text: Works with my feet/shoes.This is a really handy size. I like the shape of the metal portion which is more flattened and not as curved. I agree with other reviewers that this shoehorn seems to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: perfect small size
customer_reviews.text: perfect small size for a shoe horn. the handle is nice too
customer_reviews.author: Jessica B.

customer_reviews.title: i love the size and the two materials.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to throw in our suitcase while traveling because many of the sneakers being made now though they have lacings you need a shoe horn to put them on to avoid breaking a nail. This horn is sturdy and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to take with me to the gym! It even comes with a carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size and very well made! My shoes just glide on now!
customer_reviews.author: nursiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy slide on
customer_reviews.text: Works Great slides right on, and like the metal as I bought a plastic one at a local store, and would bend
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sturdy shoe horn.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small steel shoe horn for travel. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: W.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband asked me why I bought a shoe horn and I told him I just wanted one. Now, he uses it more than I do! Hahaha. Anyways! I love this shoe horn, it's not too small where you can easily misplace it and not too big that it's obnoxious. It's so useful if you like to wear high tops and are too lazy to untie and tie them again like me.
customer_reviews.author: Jinnie

customer_reviews.title: Great price and nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to; helps get my shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Mc Fly

ALL AGES CAN USE – from toddlers to the elderly, the shoe horn is perfectly sized to fit all shoes
PERFECT FOR TRAVELLING – compact design means it can easily be taken anywhere with no fuss
EASY TO USE DESIGN – the stainless steel helps your feet to slip easily into the shoe, and the leather strap is a great handle to help you get the best grip
